item.description:
Wonderful Bonuses:
Meghan McChesney Gilroy, the presenter at our September event re: How to Use The Four (& 5th) Agreements to Attract Your Heart's Desires, gave us some wonderful bonuses. Please enjoy them:
http://www.lifemaster....

Note: (#1) bonus on free coaching sessions were given to 5 lucky attendees in Sept.

"AWAKEN" Movie Premier
Meghan invites all of us to the "AWAKEN" movie premier where her colleague, Rita Rivera Fox, is featured.

On the verge of 2012, we have an opportunity to AWAKEN… won’t you join us?

This groundbreaking & transforming film documents the presence & wisdom of an array of teachers from diverse spiritual backgrounds on the significance of this crucial time of planetary shift & shares with us how the current global crisis is an impetus to awaken to oneness, as such revealing the true esoteric meaning of 2012.

The special screening is followed by a Q & A with Rita.

Cost: $12 Film screening only.**
Location: Cinema Salem, 1 India Square, Salem MA, 01970

**Pre-registration is recommended as seating is limited.


Also, RSVP here at our meetup, so we know YOU're coming.


"AWAKEN" Movie Premier AND WORKSHOP
There's a workshop in the afternoon for ..."The Practical Steps for Living Awake". You will explore the practical steps of living in awareness by harnessing the inspirational energy within the film.

Discover:
- Techniques to advance your conscious awakening
- How to break free from fear and limitations
- An awakening to love and oneness...
- What the Toltecs and other wisdom paths are saying about 2012

Cost: $59** for full day screening & workshop
**This is 10% off the regular price of $65, thanks to Meghan & Rita, for our members

MUST Prepay here for discount of $59: http://www.lifemaster....

Location:
--> Film: Cinema Salem, 1 India Square, Salem MA, 01970
--> Workshop: St Andrew’s Church, 135 Lafayette St, Marblehead MA, 01945

Schedule:
9:30 AM - pre-registration for screening event.
10:00 AM - screening begins followed by Q & A with Rita
12:30 - Lunch Break
2:00- 5:30- Workshop "The Practical Steps to Living in Awareness"

QUESTIONS?
Please contact Meghan Gilroy Meghan@lifemasteryprograms.com or 781-254-4172

For more info on AWAKEN event including trailer.


Please RSVP here at our meetup, so we know YOU're coming.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: "AWAKEN" Movie Premier, Discount Workshop, $300 Free Bonus Gifts
